statements.select:
select x.OldManId as ObjectId,x.OldManName as ObjectName from Oca_OldManBaseInfo x inner join Oca_OldManConfigInfo y on x.OldManId = y.OldManId left join Oca_EPay_RechargeRecord z on y.OldManId=z.ObjectId and z.AccountNature=#AccountNature# and z.PeriodId1=#PeriodId1# and z.PeriodId2=#PeriodId2# where x.Status= 1 and y.GovTurnkeyFlag=1 and z.ObjectId is null ($WhereClause$)
$OrderByClause$

select x.OldManId as ObjectId,x.OldManName as ObjectName from Oca_OldManBaseInfo x inner join Oca_OldManConfigInfo y on x.OldManId = y.OldManId left join Oca_EPay_RechargeRecord z on y.OldManId=z.ObjectId and z.AccountNature=#AccountNature# and z.PeriodId1=#PeriodId1# and z.PeriodId2=#PeriodId2# where x.Status= 1 and y.GovTurnkeyFlag=0 and z.ObjectId is null and y.AssessLevel is not null and y.AssessLevel=#AssessLevel# ($WhereClause$)
$OrderByClause$

select x.OldManId as ObjectId,x.OldManName as ObjectName from Oca_OldManBaseInfo x inner join Oca_OldManConfigInfo y on x.OldManId = y.OldManId right join Oca_EPay_RechargeRecord z on y.OldManId=z.ObjectId and z.AccountNature=#AccountNature# and z.PeriodId1=#PeriodId1# and z.PeriodId2=#PeriodId2# where x.Status= 1 and y.GovTurnkeyFlag=0 and z.ObjectId is not null and y.AssessLevel is not null and y.AssessLevel=#AssessLevel# ($WhereClause$)
$OrderByClause$

select a.*,b.FeeType,b.Remain,(CASE WHEN b.FeeType ='00002' THEN dbo.FUNC_Oca_CeilingHour(a.ServeManArriveTime,a.ServeManLeaveTime) WHEN b.FeeType ='00001' then 1.0 END) AS tResult from Oca_ServiceWorkOrder a left join Oca_EPay_OldManAccount b on a.OldManId=b.OldManId and a.ServeItemB=b.ServeItemB
a.AreaId=#AreaId# a.Status=#Status# a.DoStatus=#DoStatus# $WhereClause$
$OrderByClause$

select 1 as NoUse from Oca_ServiceWorkOrder a left join Oca_EPay_OldManAccount b on a.OldManId=b.OldManId and a.ServeItemB=b.ServeItemB
a.AreaId=#AreaId# a.Status=#Status# a.DoStatus=#DoStatus# $WhereClause$
